Field Detail

CONVERSATION_TEXT_TAB_VIEW

public static int CONVERSATION_TEXT_TAB_VIEW
To keep track of which "mode" the author-topic view's content viewer currently is. CONVERSATION_TEXT_TAB_VIEW shows the full text with keywords highlighted.

CONVERSATION_SENTENCE_TAB_VIEW

public static int CONVERSATION_SENTENCE_TAB_VIEW

CONVERSATION_KEYWORD_TAB_VIEW

public static int CONVERSATION_KEYWORD_TAB_VIEW
To keep track of which "mode" the author-topic view's content viewer currently is. CONVERSATION_KEYWORD_TAB_VIEW shows the keywords found by tf-idf values.

CONTENT_ANALYZED

public static boolean CONTENT_ANALYZED
Make it true if the lengthy content analysis is done, so it'll only process once.

KEYWORD_PERCENTAGE_TO_SHOW

public static double KEYWORD_PERCENTAGE_TO_SHOW
The percentage of the top keywords (found by tf*idf) in each document to be shown in the keyword view in AuthorTopicVizUI.

KEYWORD_COLOR

public static java.awt.Color KEYWORD_COLOR
Color to be used for displaying keywords in AuthorTopicVizUI

TEXT_FONT

public static java.awt.Font TEXT_FONT
Font to be used for displaying keywords in AuthorTopicVizUI

DEFAULT_KEYWORD_HIGHLIGHTER

public static MyKeywordsHighlighter DEFAULT_KEYWORD_HIGHLIGHTER
Default word highlighter color in the text view. Use an ahpha value so more occurences will be indicated by the color intensity.
